# svg-parser changelog

## 1.0.5

* Handle doctype and CDATA

## 1.0.4

* Handle unexpected end of input

## 1.0.3

* Prevent infinite loops on bad final closing tag

## 1.0.2

* Prevent `""=true` attributes

## 1.0.1

* Allow attributes with numbers (e.g. `x1`)
* Fix error messages

## 1.0.0

* First release
